#summary Data structure of a handle

== Handle Data Structure ==

Essentially a handle record is a set of values with 7 fields: index, type, data, ttl, permission, timestamp, reference.

|| *(handle)* || *index* || *type* || *data* || *ttl* || *permission* || *timestamp* || *reference* ||
